details.body:
This page contains education and skills agreements for 2022 to 2023. For agreements relating to other years, see the ESFA funding agreements and contracts collection page.

Overview

The agreements contain a main terms and conditions body and schedules. You can find background on the structure of the education and skills agreements on the ESFA funding agreements and contracts collection page. 

We will publish version 1 of the specialist post-16 institution agreement, version 1 of the non-maintained special schools (NMSS) agreement and version 2 of all other contracts and agreements in July 2022 along with the funding specific schedules.

The table below sets out the changes made to the 2021 to 2022 agreements for 2022 to 2023:

Education and skills agreements: schedule of changes 2022 to 2023

PDF, 2.49 MB, 68 pages

This file may not be suitable for users of assistive technology.

Request an accessible format.
If you use assistive technology (such as a screen reader) and need a version of this document in a more accessible format, please email ESFA.GOVUK-ENQUIRIES@education.gov.uk. Please tell us what format you need. It will help us if you say what assistive technology you use.
